turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'd like you order me a coffee for pickup please at Petes Coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have found 3 Petes Coffee locations near you. Which would you like to visit?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please order from Pete on Broadway in Portland.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OKay, I will order from Petes Coffee locatated at 508 SW Broadway in Portland. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order me a Golden Cold Brew Fog Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a 16 ounce Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ANd how many?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just one please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any special requests for you latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please add honey to my latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, I will ad honey. Anything else for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: NO just the latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OKay, I am confirming on 16 ouncy Golden Cold Brew Fog Latte with honey at PEte Coffee on Broadway.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink will be ready shortly for pickup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to you via text on your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: May I assist you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: NO, goodbye.
